subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Norwegian Accounting Standards Board is the accounting standard setter in Norway. We issue Norwegian Accounting Standards and Norwegian Book keeping standards. We also engage in the international debate on accounting, issuing comment letters to the IASB etc.
